data: {"generalSituation":"A dry northeast monsoon will bring mainly fine weather to the coast of southern China in the next couple of days. An intense replenishment of the northeast monsoon is expected to reach the coast of southern China early next week. The weather will become cool appreciably and windy with one or two light rain patches over the region. Besides, Tropical Cyclone Fung-wong will edge closer to the vicinity of the southern part of Taiwan and weaken gradually today. It will then transform into an extratropical cyclone.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251113","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"North force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 on high ground at first.","forecastWeather":"Sunny periods.
